CONVINCE.Definition: cause people to believe that something is true

HORRENDOUSLY.Definition: in a terrifying or horrible way

COMPOUND.Definition: an area with buildings that are surrounded by a fence or a barrier

DESCENDANT.Definition: belonging to the same family line as

DELUSIONS OF GRANDEUR.Definition: false beliefs of being very important and special

MESSIAH.Definition: leader who would solve all their problems

HARMLESS.Definition: not likely to cause damage or harm

HAREEM.Definition: group of women who lived in the same house and belonged to a master (usually a Muslim one)

CELIBATE.Definition: having no sexual relations for religious reasons

APOCALYPSE.Definition: the complete final destruction of the world according to the Bible

STANDOFF.Definition: a situation in which neither side could gain advantage

TEAR GAS.Definition: a gas that hurts the eyes and is used to control crowds of people

BE WILLING TO.Definition: be wanting to, or be happy to

CONGRESSMAN.Definition: a member of the US House of Representatives

PLEAS.Definition: requests made in an emotional way

FATE.Definition: the outcome or the end of a situation

LINE UP.Definition: be arranged in a line, form a line

PROTAGONIST.Definition: the main character of the story

SURPRISE SURPRISE.Definition: used ironically when something is believed to be entirely predictable or expected

ENLIGHTENED.Definition: having knowledge and being spiritually more advanced than usual people

AMASSING.Definition: getting a large amount of, gathering together

SALVATION.Definition: a way of being saved from danger or from ending up in hell

DOOMED.Definition: caused to have a bad end

TRIGGERING.Definition: causing something to begin, setting off

ARMAGEDDON.Definition: the last battle between good and evil before the end of the world

FERVENTLY.Definition: in a enthusiastic and passionate way

AFTERMATH.Definition: the period after the unpleasant event

GRANDEUR.Definition: the quality of being very important and special

IT TURNS OUT.Definition: it was found to be, proved to be the case

SKIMMED THE SURFACE.Definition: dealt only with the basic facts
